text: Sogod is a 4th class municipality in the province of Cebu, Philippines. According to the 2007 census, it has a population of 28,955 people. ==Barangays== Sogod is politically subdivided into 18 barangays. * Ampongol * Bagakay * Bagatayam * Bawo * Cabalawan * Cabangahan * Calumboyan * Dakit * Damolog * Ibabao * Liki * Lubo * Mohon * Nahus-an * Poblacion * Tabunok * Takay * Pansoy ==Other websites== *Philippine Standard Geographic Code Category:Settlements in Cebu
title: Sogod, Cebu
